files.description: Standalone examples showing compliant vs non-compliant inputs focused on primary-source verification, highlighting missing claim text or dataset anchor as hard failures.
Unit tests asserting the validator hard-fails when claim text or dataset anchor is missing and passes when both are present and well-formed.
